preface.title: OpenStack configuration overview
preface.para: OpenStack is a collection of open source project components that enable setting up cloud services. Each component uses similar configuration techniques and a common framework for INI file options.
This guide pulls together multiple references and configuration options for the following OpenStack components:

warning.para: This guide documents the OpenStack Juno release. In accordance with the official OpenStack Juno end-of-life, this document is frozen and will receive no further updates from the OpenStack project. Check the OpenStack Documentation page for newer documents.
